description: Connection churn, long-lived streams, header stress, and memory ceilings.
TLS and relay fault-injection behavior validation.
Adversarial parser and fuzz-regression stress suite.
Toxiproxy and tc netem tooling and live network fault probes.
Differential behavior parity checks versus mitmproxy fixtures.
Phase-5 reliability invariants: flow FSM validator, single-close guardrail, runtime budgets, idle watchdog, and H2 stage-timeout telemetry.
HTTP/1 canonicalization and smuggling-guard fixture corpus plus deterministic runtime rejection checks.
TLS strict|default|compat profile matrix, cert-profile fixture checks, and openssl/badssl probes.
Route planner/config matrix for direct|reverse|upstream-http|upstream-socks5 plus chained host allow/ignore semantics.
HTTP/2 stream lifecycle resilience (parallel stress, reset/GOAWAY tolerance, header limits) plus optional h2spec criteria command.
Deterministic event log v2 contract (stable serialization, replay diff fixtures, and machine-readable sidecar exit status).
Long-running mixed-traffic soak gate for runtime budget envelope.
